Miscellaneous sites specifically about perl

  • [http://www.perl.org/|Perl.org] – Perl's true home on the net. Tons of resources for every skill level.
  • [http://www.irc.perl.org/|irc.perl.org] – Info on the irc channels hosted at irc.perl.org.
  • [http://perl101.org/|Perl 101] "Things Every Perl Programmer Should Know" - an excellent resource, especially for beginners
  • [http://www.enlightenedperl.org/|The Enlightened Perl Organisation] – "supports certain Perl development efforts that ensure perl's future as an enterprise-grade development platform."
  • [http://www.perl.com|Perl.com] – articles, resources, etc.
  • [http://perl.oreilly.com/|Perl.oreilly.com]
  • [http://perlweekly.com/|Perl Weekly] – A free, once a week e-mail round-up of hand-picked news and articles about Perl
  • [http://lists.perl.org|a list of Perl mailing lists]
  • [http://perldoc.perl.org/|perldoc.perl.org] – all of the standard Perl documentation, on line. [http://search.cpan.org/~rjbs/perl/pod/perl.pod|Alternate: CPAN] (as of Perl 5.11.4)
  • [http://history.perl.org/|Perl timeline]
  • [http://jobs.perl.org|jobs.perl.org] – The Perl Job site
  • [http://www.perlfoundation.org/perl5/index.cgi|Perl 5 Wiki]
  • [http://www.pm.org/|Perl Mongers] – a loose association of international Perl User Groups

Sites not restricted to perl

  • [http://www.StackOverflow.com/questions/tagged/perl|StackOverflow] - a general programming forum, but Perl friendly
  • [http://www.webreference.com/perl/|"Mother of Perl"] - the Perl section of WebReference.com
  • [http://www.slashdot.org/|/.] - the infamous Slashdot
  • [http://pleac.sourceforge.net/|PLEAC] - "Programming Language Examples Alike Cookbook" - reimplementing the [http://oreilly.com/catalog/9780596003135/|Perl Cookbook] [http://examples.oreilly.com/9780596003135//|examples] in other languages
  • [http://rosettacode.org/|Rosetta Code]
    • – wiki of code examples comparing many programming tasks in many languages
  • [http://ideone.com/|Ideone] – pastebin and online interpreter for many languages

Blog sites

  • [http://www.PerlBuzz.com/|PerlBuzz] - "The newest and best of the Perl World"
  • [http://perlisalive.com/|Perl is Alive]
  • [http://proudtouseperl.org/|Proud To Use Perl]
  • [http://use.perl.org/|use Perl;] – no longer active
  • [http://modernperlbooks.com/mt/index.html|Modern Perl Books]
  • [http://blogs.perl.org/|blogs.perl.org] – a common blogging platform for the Perl community
  • [http://perlsphere.net/|Perlsphere] – The Perl firehose! The self-proclaimed biggest collection of Perl 5 blogs
  • [http://ironman.enlightenedperl.org/|Planet Perl Ironman Blog] – another blog aggregator

CPAN and related sites

  • [http://www.cpan.org/|CPAN, the Comprehensive Perl Archive Network] – repository of perl modules
  • [http://search.cpan.org/|Search CPAN]
  • [https://metacpan.org/|MetaCPAN] – alternative CPAN search
  • [http://backpan.perl.org/|BackPan] – a complete history of CPAN
  • [http://www.perl.org/cpan.html|other CPAN-related links] – on perl.org

Tools

  • [http://www.template-toolkit.org|Template - Toolkit]
  • [http://www.cygwin.com|Cygwin]
  • [http://www.fvu.myweb.nl/Projects/Bash/Web/bash.htm|Bash for Windows]
  • [http://www.chiark.greenend.org.uk/~sgtatham/putty/|Putty] a free telnet/ssh - client
  • [http://www.i-tree.org/ixplorer.htm|secure iXplorer] graphical front-end to puttys scp
  • [http://www.inf.enst.fr/~demaille/a2ps/|Any2PS]
  • [http://language.perl.com/ppt/|Unix tools] written in Perl
  • Resources for compiling Perl from source on Win32:
    • [http://www.law.berkeley.edu/computing/howto/perl/|Instructions] for compiling Perl from source on Win32
    • [http://www.cpan.org/src/5.0/perl5.005_03.tar.gz|Perl 5.00503 source] at CPAN
    • [http://www.cs.virginia.edu/~lcc-win32/|LCC-Win32] - free C/C++ compiler for Win32 from Jacob Navia
    • [http://www.borland.com/bcppbuilder/freecompiler/|FreeBCC] - free C/C++ compiler for Win32 from Borland
    • [http://www.cpan.org/authors/id/D/DO/DOUGL/|PerlCRT.dll]
    • [http://www.cpan.org/authors/id/GSAR/dmake-4.1pl1-win32.zip|dmake] - make for Win32 from Gurusamy
    • [http://download.microsoft.com/download/vc15/Patch/1.52/W95/EN-US/Nmake15.exe|nmake] - make for Win32 from Microsoft
    • [http://agnes.dida.physik.uni-essen.de/~janjaap/mingw32/|GNU software] for Win95 + NT
    • [http://www.anse.de/mysqlfront/|mySQLfront] a gui admin tool for mysql
  • Webservers for Win32
    • [http://www.apache.org/|Apache] standard on *nix, also available for Win32
    • [http://www.ritlabs.com/tinyweb/index.html|tinyweb] [id://61802|Info on Perl Monks]
    • [http://www.imatix.com|Xitami]
    • [http://www.omnicron.ab.ca/httpd/|OmniHTTPd]
    • [http://www.w3.org/Jigsaw/|Jigsaw] the [http://www.w3.org|W3C]'s Java Server
    • [http://www.analogx.com/contents/download/network/sswww.htm|AnalogX SimpleServer:WWW]
    • [http://wgz.org/chromatic/jellybean.html|Jellybean] [chromatic]s perl based webserver
